rows.label: qst710501_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm trying to compile an
encyclopedia of unique
monsters from across Alst.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0002
rows.name:
I've journeyed through Shiya,
Superbia, Liberalitas, Invidia
and Estham, and now here!

rows.label: qst710501_msg0003
rows.name:
The main Divine Beasts I still have
left to cover are Iira and Gula,
but there's just one problem...

rows.label: qst710501_msg0004
rows.name:
It's tricky to gather info about unique
monsters, because there aren't many
warriors strong enough to handle them.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0005
rows.name:
Still, I'm determined to complete
this encyclopedia no matter how
many decades it takes.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0006
rows.name:
The only question is whether I'll
kick the bucket before it's done!

rows.label: qst710501_msg0007
rows.name:
Now, with all that out of
the way... Let's have you
help out, shall we?

rows.label: qst710501_msg0008
rows.name:
To the best extent of my knowledge,
there are 16 unique monsters left
that I've yet to gather notes on.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0009
rows.name:
If you see a big monster with a peculiar
name out on your travels, that'll be one
of them uniques, sure as anything.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0010
rows.name:
Now, they're plenty dangerous, mind, but
I trust that strapping young heroes like
you can make my dream come true.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0011
rows.name:
OK then, first of all, let me
hear about any unique monsters
you might've taken out already!

rows.label: qst710501_msg0101
rows.name:
Let me know if you defeat any
unique monsters, would you? Any
information is a big help!

rows.label: qst710501_msg0102
rows.name:
Right then, here are the
details on the unique monsters
I already know about.

rows.label: qst710501_msg0103
rows.name:
I'm still missing information on
some choice unique monsters from
across Iira and Gula, you know!
